title: On an Elegant Afternoon
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>….I’m a bit nervous. Do you go to places like these often, Dia-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I don’t go that frequently. But I do go from time to time with my family<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>With your family, huh. Ruby-chan does seem like she would enjoy this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes, Ruby often begged us to go here<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I see…. Ah, Waah~!! Amazing! It’s so cute! How lovely~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, you look as happy as Ruby, Kotori-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>All the sweets are sparkling…. How truly lovely…. Ah, there’s a matcha cheesecake<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Oh my<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s our favorite things combined into one, huh, Dia-san. Fufu, I’m kind of happy. Let’s save it for last~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>My, it’s exactly because we like it that we must have it as our first bite, after all, first bites are the most delicious. Come, let’s eat it, Kotori-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
